title: Strengthening Clinical Practical Competencies: Collaborative Argumentation for Solving Social Issues

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of social phenomena and problem analysis skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively generate argument structures for social issues at least three times with peers
Learners can pose at least two critical questions in response to peers' claims during discussions
Learners can logically articulate agreed-upon social solutions in project deliverables

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
